channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Russia’s Grinding War in Ukraine
item.description: Despite claims of success in Ukraine, new CSIS data shows that Russia is paying an extraordinary price for minimal gains, with over 1.2 million casualties. Russia is also in decline as a major economic power with slow growth, weak productivity, and declining manufacturing.

item.title: The 2026 National Defense Strategy by the Numbers: Radical Changes, Moderate Changes, and Some Continuities
item.description: The 2026 National Defense Strategy denounces earlier strategies, focuses on this hemisphere, and pressures allies to provide their own defense, while citing President Trump 47 times. CSIS’s 19 charts and tables show the strategy’s changes, continuities, and omissions.
